title: Bali (1990) Bible (Print) SABDA
description: Balinese translation of the Bible published in 1990 by the Indonesian Bible Society. Balinese is a Malayo-Polynesian language spoken by 3.3 million people on the Indonesian island of Bali

language.name: Balinese
language.area: Island of Bali, north Nusa Penida, west Lombok Islands, and east Java, South Sulawesi.
